name: Match image links
description: Match image links not inside single or double quotes, for turning the text link into an html image
content: Welcome to RegExr v2.0 by gskinner.com! Edit the Expression & Text to see matches. Roll over matches or the expression for details. Undo mistakes with cmd-z. Save & Share expressions with friends or the Community. A full Reference for "http://regexr.com/foo.png" & Help is available in the Library, or watch the video Tutorial. http://regexr.com/foo.jpg Sample text for testing: abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ 0123456789 +-.,!@#$%^&*();\/|<>"' 12345 -98.7 3.141 .6180 9,000 +42 555.123.4567 +1-(800)-555-2468 foo@demo.net bar.ba@test.co.uk www.demo.com http://foo.co.uk/ http://regexr.com/foo.html?q=bar
author: cfpg.me
